code: import"antd/es/card/style/css";import _Card from"antd/es/card";import React,{useEffect}from"react";import LearningData from"./LearningData";import MyData from"../components/MyData";import Nav from"../components/nav";import{Route,Switch}from"react-router-dom";var TeacherData=function TeacherData(props){var pathname=props.history.location.pathname;useEffect(function(){pathname==='/user/resource'&&props.history.push('/user/resource/myresource');},[pathname]);var tabList=[{name:'我的资料',path:'/user/resource/myresource'},{name:'所有资料',path:'/user/resource/allresource'}];return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(_Card,{style:{margin:"0 auto"}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Nav,{tabList:tabList,location:props.history.location.pathname}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Switch,null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Route,{path:"/user/resource/myresource",component:MyData}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Route,{path:"/user/resource/allresource",component:LearningData})));};export default TeacherData;
